title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Evolution of Digital Learning and Hybrid Education Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital learning tools and foundational knowledge in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core components of blended learning (integration of online/offline, synchronous/asynchronous activities).
Learners can perform peer feedback at over 80% proficiency using collaboration tools (discussion boards, wikis, etc.) in an LMS-based asynchronous learning environment.
Learners can interpret LMS data (login frequency, learning time) for digital learner analysis and create improvement plans.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
